name: sprinter
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
someone who runs short distances very fast, especially someone who competes in races such as the 100 metres: a world-class sprinter The sprinter was stripped of his Olympic medals after testing positive for steroids. See
sprint
More examplesFewer examplesAfter running track at the University of Tennessee, she returned home to Northern California and became a professional sprinter.He's a faster sprinter than me.Sprinters have large muscle groups they want to keep warm.
